title: Total sales of Olive Garden in the U.S. 2016 to 2019
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Sales in billion U.S. dollars, containing a total of 4 data points.
In general Sales in billion U.S. dollars has rose over the Year.
Sales in billion U.S. dollars is slightly increasing from 2016 to 2019.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2018 and 2019.
The highest Sales in billion U.S. dollars, of value 4.29 was reached at Year 2019
Minimum Sales in billion U.S. dollars about 3.84 was reached at Year 2016
